name: Space Dog 1
description:
This is a micro story I made to challenge myself. I made it during a 3-day bank holiday to put my thoughts together and remind myself that a creative part of me is still there, still breathing and ready to be back in action. I came up with the story, simple tunes and sprites and built it together. This is my first {{game}} {{released}}, please enjoy. 

I used Renpy, Figma, Miro and GarageBand. If you are interested, here is the link for the sprites and background. 

Special thanks and shout outs to:

  • Dima Vesnin for inspiration. Basically I built my game with 'What would Dima say?’ line in mind. Please follow his channel in Telegram (https://t.me/backtracking) and Twitter (https://twitter.com/dimavesnin).
  • Anastasiya Fedoruk for QA and proofreading.
